title: Inductance - emf when current is alpha t-squared

content.question: What is the magnitude of the induced <math alttext="e m f" overflow="scroll"> <mi>emf</mi> </math> of the inductor as a function of time?

choices.label: <math alttext="one third L alpha t cubed" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>L</mi><mi>α</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
